name: Mt. Cook
description: Named after the highest peak in New Zealand, Mt. Cook by Kiwiseeds is a former Cannabis Cup champion. After selecting their top Afghani female, a special Northern Lights and Hash Plant male was used to pollinate and create this potent indica. Known to be powerful and sedative, this is a great strain to relax and catch some sleep with.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Focused, Happy, Relaxed, Sleepy, Depression, Headaches, Inflammation, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms
